Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Complete MegaOutreach platform setup for production deployment

- Configure production server \(31.222.235.197\) with correct ports \(3000/8080\)
- Add missing critical files \(webhooks.ts, ThemeContext.tsx, MainLayout.tsx\)
- Migrate Express middleware to Fastify \(auth.ts, analytics.ts\)
- Complete English localization across all UI components
- Remove mass mailing terminology, emphasize personal outreach
- Add comprehensive Settings pages \(Accounts, Team, Integrations, API\)
- Update Docker configurations for production deployment
- Add initial database migration schema
- Install all required npm dependencies
- Update documentation with production setup guide

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
